info.task: navigate backwards to expanded accordion header
info.title: Navigate backwards to an expanded accordion header in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnSecondAccordionHeaderAndHideFirstAccordionContent
setupScript.description: sets focus on the 'Billing Address' accordion header, and hides the content associated with the 'Personal Information' accordion header while leaving it expanded

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Billing Address' accordion header, navigate to the 'Personal Information' accordion header.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Billing Address' accordion header, navigate to the 'Personal Information' accordion header.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.
